Kora Home Calendar Notes Profile Hello,
Hello blank fragment Login //about us text KORA: An All-in-one Productivity Application is a Capstone Project that aims provide different users a more simple experience in using productivity apps by reducing their amount of time in opening different applications that could be merged into one. KORA aid its users by providing practicality in app usage. Instead of switching from one mobile app to another, KORA places them all in one place. The development of KORA begun in December 2020. KORA is developed by Sophia Victoria Mendoza, Juan Francisco Parayno, Jane April Sim who are all students of the University of the Cordilleras. KORA was initially inspired by secretaries who are responsible for finishing specific clerical work at a workplace where they are present. KORA was named after a real secretary who works under one of the app\'s \'s father. As students of the University of the Cordilleras, we have worked together as a team to finish our final project. In the process of developing a software capable of aiding different people in their daily lives, productivity became our inspiration as well as our motivation. Our team had spent time and effort into accomplishing what we describe as an All-in-one Productivity App. In regards to this, our group hopes to be of use to the fulfillment of the Sustainable Development Goals 2030 agenda, specifically in the field of work and education. KORA is an All-in-one Productivity Application that combines different features of other productivity applications like Notes, Reminder, Calendar. At Kora, we have seen the impact that time management, efficiency, and productivity have on students and workers. The fact is, managing a productive routine is challenging: keeping track of deadlines and schedules can be tough, motivation may falter over time and disorganization can be a drag. That\'s why we created Kora: an all-in-one productivity application to boost your productivity. An all-in-one application for \n managing your schedule, tasks and notes. An All-in-one Productivity Application is a mobile application that combines multiple mobile applications that are used for productivity. Some of these applications include Notes, Reminders, and Calendar to name a few. KORA aims to be rid of the hassle of having to switch from one app to another as making it practical and unique. With that being said, KORA aims to provide faster service to its users by allowing them to switch from one productive task to another inside it.
